title: Canyon De Chelly National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park              MORE ABOUT THE PARK To learn more about Canyon de Chelly National Monument, please check out the sections for park photos, management, history, youth, and the bookstore. Another great way to learn about the park is to join a free Ranger led program in the summer!      CURRENT PROJECTS The Cultural Resources team will conduct its Watershed Project Archeological Survey this summer. A total of approximately 704 acres will be surveyed for archeological resources. A second project component - the updating of records for previously documented archeological resources - will improve future resource planning and management, and will provide data for publications. For more information about this project, please contact Keith Lyons or Joshua Ramsey at 928-674-5500.
